Henri Blaffart (22 June 1965 21 March 2008) bụ onye Belgium na-echekwa ihe na gburugburu ebe obibi.

Henri Blaffart gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Agronomic Science nke Gembloux na Belgium n'afọ 1990 na nzere na agronomy, na-ekwusi ike na ọhịa na mmiri. Blaffart malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ nchekwa dị iche iche n'ụwa niile mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, gụnyere Ethiopia, Cambodia, Samoa na Papua New Guinea tupu ọ kwaga New Caledonia.

Blaffart malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ Conservation International, ọrụ Mont Panié Special Botanical Reserve na New Caledonia, na 2002. Ọ sonyeere Conservation International na 2006 dị ka onye isi ọrụ Mont Panié. Blaffart sooro obodo Kanak rụọ ọrụ na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi nke Mont Panié, nke dị na North Province nke New Caledonia. Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ New Caledonia iji chebe Mont Panié Reserve, gụnyere gọọmentị North Province, Dayu Biik Association, nke gụnyere agbụrụ Kanak mpaghara, Caledonian Institute of Agronomy na ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ọha na eze na òtù gọọmentị.ndị ọzọ.

Henri Blaffart buuru ma nwụọ na mberede mgbe ọ na-anwa ịgafe Osimiri Tiendanite na North Province na 21 Machị 2008. Ọ dị afọ iri anọ na abụọ ma nne ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, ndị bi na Belgium, hapụrụ ya.
